amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Payments in Lieu of Taxes (PILT) funding by $10 million and to reduce the appropriation for fossil energy research and development by $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 27 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996, to increase federal payments in lieu of taxes to local governments (PILT) by $10 million and to reduce the appropriation for fossil energy research and development program by $25 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237 (Roll no. 265).
